description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear extension) and associated external and internal alterations.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: Location Plan; EX01 (EXISTING: Ground Floor Plan); EX02 (EXISTING: First Floor Plan); EX03 (EXISTING: Second Floor Plan); EX04 (EXISTING: Roof Plan); EX05

(EXISTING: Section A-A); EX06 (EXISTING: Section B-B); EX07 (EXISTING: Front Elevation); EX08 (EXISTING: Rear Elevation); EX09 (EXISTING: Garden Plan); P01 Rev A (PROPOSED: Ground Floor Plan); P02 Rev A (PROPOSED: First Floor Plan); P03 (PROPOSED: Second Floor Plan); P04 (PROPOSED: Roof Plan); P05 Rev A (PROPOSED: Section A-A); P06 (PROPOSED: Section B-B); P07 (PROPOSED: Front Elevation) Received 31 August 2022; P08 Rev A (PROPOSED: Rear Elevation); P09 (PROPSED: Garden Plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roof(s) of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.
Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
